title: Iketeru Futari
resume: Saji Keisuke is a rather energetic young man who is quite smitten with the mysterious Koizumi Akira who appears to hate men. And then there is also Saji's well-endowed childhood friend Yuki who sees Akira as a rival. So what will become of this love-triangle?
